mapper.insert: INSERT INTO workspace_member ( workspace_no, email, type_no ) VALUES ( #{ workspaceNo }, #{ email }, 1 )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM workspace_member wm INNER JOIN member m ON wm.email = m.email INNER JOIN workspace w ON wm.workspace_no = w.workspace_no WHERE w.workspace_no = #{ workspaceNo } AND wm.type_no = 2
SELECT * FROM workspace WHERE workspace_no = #{ workspaceNo }
SELECT * FROM workspace_member wm INNER JOIN member m ON wm.email = m.email INNER JOIN workspace w ON wm.workspace_no = w.workspace_no WHERE w.workspace_no = #{ workspaceNo } AND wm.type_no = 1

SELECT * FROM workspace_member wm INNER JOIN member m ON wm.email = m.email INNER JOIN workspace w ON wm.workspace_no = w.workspace_no WHERE w.workspace_no = #{ position } AND m.name like concat('%',#{name},'%') OR m.department like concat('%',#{name},'%')
SELECT * FROM workspace_member wm INNER JOIN member m ON wm.email = m.email INNER JOIN workspace w ON wm.workspace_no = w.workspace_no WHERE w.workspace_no = #{ workspaceNo } ORDER BY m.email asc

select workspace_name from workspace where workspace_no = any( select workspace_no from workspace_member where email = #{ email } )
